Question: After Go ****, Young Go **** starred in Every Day's a Holiday (1937) for Paramount before their association came to an end.
Hints: Novak once commented, "I believe I was put on this Earth to take care of this person.".
NBC personally blamed this person for the incident and banned her (and the mention of her name) from their stations.
Adapted from a script written by this person, daily revisions and disagreements hampered production from the beginning.
